## 7.3 Exercises {.unnumbered}

1.  If you go to Tools \> Global Options \> Appearance you can change the theme of your RStudio.

2.  RStudio will warn with a caution icon (orange triangle with an exclamation point in it) if variable used in your code is not defined in your scope (i.e., your environment).
